-g.desc: Get illusts' pictures from the given list
-g.type: list of string with pure numbers

-d.desc: Get illusts' pictures into a self-built database
-d.type: list of string with pure numbers

--headless.desc: Set to work headless without displaying the browser UI

--profile.desc: Set the given browser's profile and write to the configuration file
--profile.type: The first string represents a browser, and the second a directory.

--browser.desc: Set the current working browser. Supports Edge, Chrome and Firefox.

--r18.desc: Set whether to start up with configuring r18. Only available for original Pixiv crawler.

--doujin.desc: Get r-18 doujin manga from given website. Some searching keywords featuring characters or works are needed.

--cap.desc: Set the maximum number of targets you want to get. If this option is not set, the process will fall dafault to None.
--cap.type: A specified number or None to get all searching results.
